description:
An ally kicks an enemy into their Nexus, <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>striking</style></link> both.
If the enemy survives, <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> it.
Shuffle a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Lee Sin</style></link> into your deck.
descriptionRaw:
An ally kicks an enemy into their Nexus, striking both.
If the enemy survives, Recall it.
Shuffle a Lee Sin into your deck.
flavorText: "The Dragon must be unleashed, or it will consume me from within." - Lee Sin
name: Lee Sin's Dragon's Rage
